title: Mini-Ep 68: Body Acne Struggles with Priyanka Mattoo
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 68: Body Acne Struggles with Priyanka Mattoo
itunes:subtitle: Former F35 guest Priyanka Mattoo comes on this week’s episode to help Kate and Doree respond to listener questions. Priyanka answers someone who wants to know how she’s managing her life now that she has a second child, and then they hear listener sugg...
description:
Former F35 guest Priyanka Mattoo comes on this week’s episode to help Kate and Doree respond to listener questions. Priyanka answers someone who wants to know how she’s managing her life now that she has a second child, and then they hear listener suggestions for how to deal with body acne and encourage someone to brag about themselves in their bio.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • The Art of Racing In The Rain - Pre-sale starts July 25. In theaters August 9.
  • Fabletics - Get 2 leggings for only $24 when you go to fabletics.com/forever35.
  • Joybird - For 25% off your first order visit joybird.com/forever35 and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • ThirdLove - Get 15% off your first order when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • Blinkist - Go to blinkist.com/forever to start your 7-day free trial.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
